## ⚖️ Traditional AI vs. Generative AI

<div class="columns">
<div class="column">

<div class="gradient-box gradient-blue">
<h4>📊 Traditional AI - Analyzer</h4>
<ul>
<li><strong>Purpose:</strong> Understand & Predict</li>
<li><strong>Output:</strong> Insights</li>
<li><strong>Examples:</strong> Netflix, Fraud detection</li>
<li><strong>Strength:</strong> Accuracy</li>
</ul>
</div>

</div>
<div class="column">

<div class="gradient-box gradient-purple">
<h4>✨ Generative AI - Creator</h4>
<ul>
<li><strong>Purpose:</strong> Create & Generate</li>
<li><strong>Output:</strong> Original Content</li>
<li><strong>Examples:</strong> ChatGPT, AI art</li>
<li><strong>Strength:</strong> Creativity</li>
</ul>
</div>

</div>
</div>

### Comparison Matrix

| Aspect | Traditional AI | Generative AI |
|--------|---------------|---------------|
| **Focus** | Analysis | Creation |
| **Data** | Structured | Diverse |
| **UX** | Reports | Conversations |
| **Creativity** | Low | High |

### Best Practices for Ethical AI Use

1. **Transparency** - Know when using AI
2. **Attribution** - Credit AI assistance
3. **Verification** - Double-check info
4. **Privacy** - Don't share sensitive data
5. **Balance** - Combine AI with human insight
